techmeme.title: Sources: Apple is working with Sony to add support for PlayStation VR2 controllers in visionOS; Apple has sold fewer than 500K units of the Vision Pro (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)

As digital assets go more mainstream, memecoins like PNUT, named after a euthanised pet squirrel, show how the information ecosystem is changing in finance (Gillian Tett/Financial Times)
